dict.acceptation: 求出比值，除，使…成比例；将（相片）按比例放大[缩小]；

sent.orig: The suitable concentration of AMPA is 2.3μM, which leaded to the Ratio of 0.8±0.14.
sent.trans: AMPA作用的最适浓度为2.3μM,反映细胞内[Ca2+]高低的指标—Ratio值约为0.80±0.14。

sent.orig: Lumped constant (LC) is the ratio of FDG metabolism ratio to glucose metabolism ratio.
sent.trans: 集总常数）是FDG（氟代脱氧葡萄糖）与葡萄糖的代谢率之比。

sent.orig: The parameters include: real contact area ratio, open void area ratio, closed void area ratio.
sent.trans: 这些表征表面功能特性的参数包括：实体接触面积比、开放空体面积比、封闭空体面积比。

sent.orig: The quick ratio (or acid-test ratio) is an improvement to the current ratio.
sent.trans: 速动比率（或酸性试验比率）是对流动比率的一种改进。

sent.orig: Therefore, relative to ratio look low, high-ratio is not bad, like low ratio.
sent.trans: 所以，市盈率高低要相对地看待，并非高市盈率不好，低市盈率就好。
